title: Website Cache
subtitle: Improve your website's loading speed by managing the cache.

refresh.title: Clear Cache
refresh.description: Clear your website's cache to ensure visitors see the latest version of your content. This may temporarily slow down your site while the cache rebuilds.

confirm.title: Clear Website Cache?
confirm.description: This will clear all cached content on your website. Visitors may experience slower loading times for a short period while the cache rebuilds.
confirm.warning: Your website may load slower temporarily after clearing the cache.

info.title: About Website Cache
info.description: Caching stores copies of your website's files to make them load faster for visitors. When you update your website, you may need to clear the cache so visitors can see your changes immediately.
